com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util

Class StaticArrayBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util.StaticArrayBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StaticBuffer, Comparable<StaticBuffer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadArrayBuffer, StaticArrayEntry

    public class StaticArrayBuffer
extends Object
implements StaticBuffer
    Implementation of StaticBuffer against byte array.

    The byte to primitive conversion code was copied from / is inspired by Kryo's Input class:

    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
